com.interpss.core.aclf.adj

Interface RemoteQControlGroup

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AclfBusControl, BaseBusBranchControl, com.hazelcast.nio.serialization.DataSerializable, org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject, IAclfAdjustment, IShuntQFunc, NameTag, org.eclipse.emf.common.notify.Notifier, PVBusLimit, RemoteQBus
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    RemoteQControlGroupImpl

    public interface RemoteQControlGroup
extends RemoteQBus, IShuntQFunc
    A representation of the model object 'Remote QControl Group'. To allow better coordination of a group of remote Q control devices, such as SwitchedShunt, SVC, RemoteQBus, etc. There is a requirement that all of the switched shunts in a control group be connected to the same bus or contained within the same ZBR group. The remoteQControlGroup is connected to a primary bus within the ZBR group Reference: https://www.powerworld.com/WebHelp/Content/MainDocumentation_HTML/Switched_Shunt_Control.htm

    The following features are supported:

    • Primary Bus
    • Switched Shunt List
    See Also:
    AclfAdjustPackage.getRemoteQControlGroup()
